===About Conrad500===
'''Conrad500''' (born '''Conrad Stiller''' on November 6, 1988) is member of the [[Whirled:About|Whiki]] community. Born and raised in Louisiana, Conrad moved to Houston, Texas after Hurricane Katrina destroyed everything in his life. Even though he sometimes comes off as rude or mean, he is a very nice person and will help you with any non idiotic problems.
